title: Wish I could rate this more than 5 stars!
content: I chose the Conair Big Curls and Waves Jumbo Ceramic Hot Rollers after reading dozens of reviews, plus comparing the pros/cons with other Conair hot rollers.  I am a senior citizen with shoulder length natural hair, color is natural combo of blonde/gray/silver/white.  My hair is fine and completely straight.  I have used these felt rollers 3-4 times and I am so pleased with the volume and soft curls resulting. I use a pick and finger-comb my hair out, no brush.  I receive so many compliments every time.  Now, in hot, humid Florida, my curls do not retain the volume hours on end, plus I do not use hair spray. But I am ok with that.  Regarding the device, it heats quickly, it comes with both the plastic claw-type clips and metal clips.  All rollers are felt covered and the same size, which is one of my reasons for choosing this set. My hair never tangled in a roller.  Do they get hot?  Yes--after all, they are called "hot rollers."  When a couple of rollers near my face/ears felt hot against my skin, I just repositioned them.  The unit would be bulky for traveling, but that was not a feature that was important to me.
